mapper.select: select authorid, authorname, authoremail, authorsex, authorincome, authorintroduction, authorworks, authordots from author where authorid=#{authorid};
select authorid, authorname, authoremail, authorsex, authorincome, authorintroduction, authorworks, authordots from author;
mapper.insert: insert into author( authorname, authoremail, authorsex, authorincome, authorintroduction, authorworks, authordots) values( #{authorname}, #{authoremail}, #{authorsex}, #{authorincome}, #{authorintroduction}, #{authorworks}, #{authordots});
mapper.update: update author set authorname=#{authorname}, authoremail=#{authoremail}, authorsex=#{authorsex}, authorincome=#{authorincome}, authorintroduction=#{authorintroduction}, authorworks=#{authorworks}, authordots=#{authordots} where authorid=#{authorid};
